channel.title: 637 Help
channel.description:
I have a few glitches on the 637 server I'm running. I would like to know how/where to edit the files to patch the following bugs:
Bugs 1. Can't right click tind a barricade in Castle Wars 2. Barricades don't burn long enough in Castle Wars 3. Pathfinding sucks 4. Should not be able to light a barricade on fire and keep standing on it 5. Barricades can be cleared diagonally (should only be from N, S, E, W) 6. Big doors don't work correctly in Castle Wars. They just operate as regular doors.
If anyone would like to help me over TV then I will "reward" them.

item.title: 637 Help
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

I have a few glitches on the 637 server I’m running. I would like to know how/where to edit the files to patch the following bugs:

Bugs

  1. Can’t right click tind a barricade in Castle Wars
  2. Barricades don’t burn long enough in Castle Wars
  3. Pathfinding sucks
  4. Should not be able to light a barricade on fire and keep standing on it
  5. Barricades can be cleared diagonally (should only be from N, S, E, W)
  6. Big doors don’t work correctly in Castle Wars. They just operate as regular doors.

If anyone would like to help me over TV then I will “reward” them.

Read full topic
